speaker: Elder
dialogue: Welcome, brave adventurer! The kingdom needs your help.

speaker: Elder
dialogue: The dark lord has stolen the sacred crystal from our temple.

speaker: Blacksmith
dialogue: I can forge you a mighty sword, but I need dragon scales.

speaker: Blacksmith
dialogue: Bring me ten dragon scales and I'll make you the finest blade.

speaker: Merchant
dialogue: Fresh potions! Healing potions, mana potions, get them here!

speaker: Merchant
dialogue: Looking for rare items? I might have what you need for the right price.

speaker: Guard
dialogue: Halt! Only those with the king's permission may enter.

speaker: Guard
dialogue: The castle is on high alert since the crystal was stolen.

speaker: Wizard
dialogue: The dark lord draws power from the stolen crystal.

speaker: Wizard
dialogue: You must find the three ancient keys to enter his fortress.

speaker: Innkeeper
dialogue: Rest well, traveler. The road ahead is dangerous.

speaker: Innkeeper
dialogue: I heard rumors of treasure in the abandoned mine.

speaker: Villager
dialogue: My daughter went missing near the haunted forest.

speaker: Villager
dialogue: Please help find her! She was gathering herbs.

speaker: Knight
dialogue: Train hard! The dark lord's minions grow stronger each day.

speaker: Knight
dialogue: I can teach you advanced combat techniques.

speaker: Priestess
dialogue: The sacred crystal protected our land for generations.

speaker: Priestess
dialogue: Without it, darkness spreads across the kingdom.

speaker: Thief
dialogue: Psst! Want to know a secret passage into the castle?

speaker: Thief
dialogue: For fifty gold coins, I'll tell you everything.
